rules_text:
Ascend to godhood [i](If you control seven or more nonland permanents, you reach godhood for the rest of the game.)[/i]
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}, {T}: Target nonlegendary creature you control becomes a legendary God in addition to its other types. Put two +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a sorcery and only if you’ve reached godhood.
